mapper.select: /* 총 수익 금액 조회 */ SELECT SUM(msmc.last_flatform_calculation_amount) FROM mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation msmc INNER JOIN mentor_calculation_demand_completion mcdc ON msmc.mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation_code = mcdc.mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation_code WHERE mcdc.calculation_status = '플랫폼이 멘토에게 정산 완료';

/* 총 정산 금액 */ SELECT SUM(msmc.mentor_calculation_amount) FROM mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation msmc INNER JOIN mentor_calculation_demand_completion mcdc ON msmc.mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation_code = mcdc.mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation_code WHERE mcdc.calculation_status = '플랫폼이 멘토에게 정산 완료';
mapper.update: /* 관리자가 정산 신청 승인 */ UPDATE mentor_calculation_demand_completion SET calculation_give_date = NOW(), manager_id = #{managerId}, calculation_status='플랫폼이 멘토에게 정산 완료' WHERE mentor_calculation_demand_completion_code = #{settlementCode};
mapper.select: /* 정산 내역 행의 갯수 */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mentor_calculation_demand_completion mcdc INNER JOIN mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation msmc ON mcdc.mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation_code = msmc.mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation_code WHERE mcdc.calculation_status = '플랫폼이 멘토에게 정산 완료';

/* 정산 내역 조회 */ SELECT mcdc.mentor_id, msmc.mentor_notice_code, msmc.mentor_calculation_amount, mcdc.calculation_give_date FROM mentor_calculation_demand_completion mcdc INNER JOIN mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation msmc ON mcdc.mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation_code = msmc.mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation_code WHERE mcdc.calculation_status = '플랫폼이 멘토에게 정산 완료' LIMIT #{rowPerPage} OFFSET #{offset};

/* 정산 신청 내역 행의 갯수 */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mentor_calculation_demand_completion mcdc INNER JOIN mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation msmc ON mcdc.mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation_code = msmc.mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation_code WHERE mcdc.calculation_status = '멘토가 플랫폼에 정산 요청';

/* 정산 신청 내역 조회 */ SELECT mcdc.mentor_calculation_demand_completion_code, mcdc.mentor_id, mcdc.mentor_notice_code, msmc.last_amount, msmc.mentor_calculation_amount, mcdc.calculation_demand_date FROM mentor_calculation_demand_completion mcdc INNER JOIN mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation msmc ON mcdc.mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation_code = msmc.mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation_code WHERE mcdc.calculation_status = '멘토가 플랫폼에 정산 요청' LIMIT #{rowPerPage} OFFSET #{offset};
/* 결제 내역 조회 */ SELECT settlement_id, last_amount, settlement_day, settlement_method FROM mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation LIMIT #{rowPerPage} OFFSET #{offset};
